description: This file demonstrates the usage of the OpenAIEmbedder class to generate embeddings for a text string and to initialize an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database, including embedding configuration.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base that uses a vector database and embedder for storing and retrieving embeddings.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class responsible for generating embeddings using OpenAI's models.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a PostgreSQL-based vector database for storing embeddings.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input.
